document.full_text: actor daniel radcliffe received a warm response from critics in reviews posted monday for his broadway musical debut, if not for his musical prowess, for his enthusiasm and eager manner evident on stage.
document.title: daniel radcliffe charms critics in broadway musical
lines_and_colors: actor daniel radcliffe received a warm response from critics in reviews posted monday for his broadway musical debut, if not for his musical prowess, for his enthusiasm and eager manner evident on stage.
